news.title: Terry Reid, Storied British Rocker, Dies at 75
news.summary: Known as Superlungs for his indomitable voice, the singer-songwriter became a cult hero after declining to front Led Zeppelin and Deep Purple

news.title: Listen to Big Thief’s New Songs “Los Angeles” and “Grandmother”
news.summary: Two more tracks from the new album Double Infinity, including one featuring Laraaji

news.title: Ela Minus Announces Tour Dates, Shares Nick León Remixes of “QQQQ”: Listen
news.summary: León’s “Apocalypto Mix” and extended club mix of the Día album track appear alongside Minus’ own edits on a new EP

news.title: Joan Shelley Announces New Album Real Warmth, Shares New Song “Everybody”: Listen
news.summary: The Kentucky songwriter’s follow-up to 2022’s The Spur is out September 19 via No Quarter

news.title: MTV VMAs 2025 Nominees Announced: See the Full List Here
news.summary: Lady Gaga, Bruno Mars, and Kendrick Lamar lead the field as the only artists with nominations in the double digits

news.title: Ozzy Osbourne’s Cause of Death Revealed to Be a Heart Attack
news.summary: The cause was disclosed on a death certificate that the late Black Sabbath singer’s eldest daughter submitted in London

news.title: The Jesus Lizard Cancel 2025 Tour Due to “Serious Health Incident”
news.summary: The post-hardcore band elaborated that “the affected member’s prognosis is excellent”

news.title: Watch Hayley Williams’ New Video for “Ego Death at a Bachelorette Party”
news.summary: The first visual to go with the Paramore singer-songwriter’s latest batch of songs

news.title: Nick Cave and Warren Ellis to Score TV Adaptation of The Death of Bunny Munro
news.summary: Matt Smith produces and stars in the new series, out this year, based on Cave’s book

news.title: Algernon Cadwallader Announce Tour and First Album in 14 Years, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: Trying Not to Have a Thought, the influential emo band’s third LP, comes out next month on Saddle Creek
